charges.charge_disposition: Defendant is committed to the custody of the U.S. Bureau of Prisons for a term of 40 years on count 1 and five years consecutive on count 39. Upon release he shall be on supervised release for 10 years on count one and 3 years on count 39 to run cocurrently. The defendant shall pay a fine of $15,000.00 and a special assessment of $100.00. *PURSUANT TO AMENDED JUDGMENT ENTERED 2/12/98-Per the order granting the second rule 35 motion filed on 2/12/98, the defendant's sentence is hereby reduced from 480 months to 216 months on count 1. The 5 year consecutive term on count 39 remains the same. The total term on both counts is now 216 months. (Correction is to total term of incarceration-276 months) (1s)

The 5 year consecutive term on count 39 remains the same. The total term on both counts is now 216 months. (Correction is to total term of incarceration-276 months) (39s)
